summary: The course CDO – CDAiO מחזור14 is designed to bridge academia and industry, focusing on the roles and responsibilities of Chief Data, AI, and Analytics Officers. It covers a wide range of topics including data strategy, platform architecture, cloud security, data privacy, and governance. The course includes 27 professional meetings and 2 enrichment sessions, with a strong emphasis on physical attendance to foster interaction and networking. Participants are expected to complete a final project that encapsulates the main learning topics, with collaboration opportunities with MIT Chief Data Officer and Information Quality Symposium.
full_text: COURSE NAME: CDO – CDAiO, Cohort 14. COURSE OVERVIEW: The course aims to bridge the gap between academia and industry, focusing on Chief Data Officers and Chief Data Ai & Analytics Officers. COURSE LEADERSHIP: Eran Shaham is the Director of the School of High-Tech and Cyber. Esther Agaiev is the Course Coordinator. Ido Biger is the CDAiO Track Leader, EVP, CIO at Delek US, and CEO at DK. Lior Israeli is the CDAiO Track Leader, Head of Data, AI & Analytics at Circles Ai. Oren Mizrahi is a lecturer in AI/ML and Data Science & CDO Operational Management. Einat Shimony is a lecturer in CDO, Data & AI Literacy. Itay Hazan is a lecturer in Data Monetization. Alon Schwartz is a lecturer in Digital Transformation and Data. Oren Harel is a lecturer in Data Governance Technologies. Tani Shapira is a legal expert in privacy protection. Hillel Kuberovsky is a lecturer in Information Security and Career Management. Dor Eliav is a lecturer in Effective Presentation and Public Speaking. Oren Yeager is a lecturer in Cloud Transformation and Architecture. COURSE SCHEDULE: The course includes 27 professional meetings and 2 enrichment meetings. Meetings are held on Mondays and Thursdays from 17:30 to 21:30. LEARNING FORMAT: Physical learning environment includes classrooms in buildings 403 and 505, a protected area in building 404, and a cafeteria between buildings 403 and 404. Digital learning environment includes a class WhatsApp group, a permanent Zoom link, a Drive with lecture recordings, and a course contact page. TUITION AND FEES: Parking fees are approximately 20 ₪ per evening or 300 ₪ for the entire study period. COURSE TOPICS: Data & Insights Driven Organization, The CDAiO Roles, Data Strategy building process, Data Platform & Architecture, Cloud Journey and Security, Data Privacy & Regulations, Organizational Data Governance, The Data Analyst, Data Visualization & Story Telling, Data Science Life Cycle, Data Science Operation Management, Generative AI Projects, Data Monetization, Executive Look at Modern Project Management With AI, Data & AI Literacy, CDAiO Final Project & Summary Lecture, Career Management & LinkedIn Appearance, Building a winning presentation & Persuasive speeches, Advanced Project Management aimed for Data Products. CERTIFICATIONS AWARDED: CDAiO Final Project and eligibility for a certificate. REGISTRATION AND CONTACT INFORMATION: For registration, contact Esther Agaiev at esther.asulin@biu.ac.il. INSTITUTIONAL INFORMATION: The course is a collaboration with MIT Chief Data Officer and Information Quality Symposium.
